name: Splatterlinge
tagline: A project for Advanced Game Development at the university of Ravensburg-Weingarten
body:
### Welcome to Splatterlinge.  
This game is just for fun! Don't take it serious!


### Build

#### Requirements
```
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake
$ sudo apt-get install libopenal-dev libvorbis-dev libglew-dev
```

#### Build  
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/splatterlinge/Splatterlinge.png)](https://travis-ci.org/splatterlinge/Splatterlinge)
```
$ git clone https://github.com/splatterlinge/Splatterlinge.git
$ cd Splatterlinge
$ git checkout master
$ cmake .
$ make
```

#### Run Game
```
$ cd Splatterlinge
$ ./bin/Splatterlinge
```
